alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garland and north central Hot Spring Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockwell, or 8 miles southwest of Hot Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Lofton... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Social Hill... Sunshine... Royal... Lake Catherine State Park... Gulpha Gorge... Pettyview... Hempwallace... Pearcy... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 89 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
